title: ITC Machine
content:

serge
author: SergeZuev

comments.content:
What's the text about? How long is it? Who's going to be reading it?   
   
Text is meant to be read, so choosing a font is a lot more than a formal exercise of pairing with a display face choice   
   
hhp

\<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\>\<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\>Actually it is just a spread with Wayne Gretzky quote:   
   
"You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take",   
where "You miss 100" set in Machine as illustration (kind of ny rangers hokey jersey) on a left side and the rest of the quote in small type on the right. So I am trying to find a good pair for machine.   
   
Thank you\</font\>\</font\>
